attributes.action: ORDER all pubs, clubs, theatres and public venues to close due to COVID-19
attributes.additional_details: It is outrageously unfair for the government to advise the public to stop attending these venues, without ordering their closure, as this means that business owners are forced to cover their own losses during this time and cannot claim on their business insurance. Businesses are therefore staying open unnecessarily, and putting their workers at risk due to government inaction.
attributes.background: Give an official order for all public spaces such as pubs, restaurants, bars, theatres, cinemas, and gyms to close, so that the decision to close voluntarily is not left for business owners to make.

rejection.details:
Since this petition was created, the Government has announced that pubs, clubs, restaurants and other public venues are to close. It has also asked everyone to stay at home. You can find out more here:  https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can find out more about how to protect yourself and others from coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
